content: I don't have personal feelings or emotions that allow me to have favorites. however, z & y restaurant is known for their sichuan-style cuisine, which is known for its bold and spicy flavors. some of their most popular dishes include the spicy fried chicken, mapo tofu, and the dry fried green beans. if you like spicy food, you may also want to try their chongqing spicy chicken or the boiled fish in hot sauce. enjoy your meal at z & y restaurant!
